# $ ./bsg_ascii_to_rom.py bsg_div_srt_sel_rom.txt bsg_div_srt_sel_rom 2'b11
# 000: eZERO
# 001: ePOS_1
# 011: ePOS_2
# 111: eNEG_2
# 101: eNEG_1
